verses.verse: יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah מָלַ֗ךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> [when he was] five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's אֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> [was] Abijah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had done דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> according to all that David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַשָּׁנָה֩ <S%H8141><s%> year הָרִאשׁוֹנָ֨ה <S%H7223><s%> He in the first לְמָלְכ֜וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first פָּתַ֛ח <S%H6605><s%> opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּלְת֥וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽם׃ <S%H2388><s%> and repaired

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he brought in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וַיַּֽאַסְפֵ֖ם <S%H622><s%> and gathered them together לִרְח֥וֹב <S%H7339><s%> street הַמִּזְרָֽח׃ <S%H4217><s%> into the east

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said לָהֶ֖ם שְׁמָע֣וּנִי <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> me ye Levites עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now הִֽתְקַדְּשׁ֗וּ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify וְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H6942><s%> now yourselves and sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers וְהוֹצִ֥יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and carry forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנִּדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> the filthiness מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> out of the holy

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָעֲל֣וּ <S%H4603><s%> have trespassed אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> For our fathers וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and done הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וַיַּֽעַזְבֻ֑הוּ <S%H5800><s%> and have forsaken וַיַּסֵּ֧בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> him and have turned away פְנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces מִמִּשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> from the habitation יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> and turned עֹֽרֶף׃ <S%H6203><s%> [their] backs

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> have also סָֽגְר֞וּ <S%H5462><s%> Also they have shut up דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors הָאוּלָ֗ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch וַיְכַבּוּ֙ <S%H3518><s%> and put out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּר֔וֹת <S%H5216><s%> the lamps וּקְטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הִקְטִ֑ירוּ <S%H6999><s%> and have not burned וְעֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or הֶעֱל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> nor offered בַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> [place] unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become קֶ֣צֶף <S%H7110><s%> Wherefore the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was against יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> was upon Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem וַיִּתְּנֵ֤ם <S%H5414><s%> and he hath delivered [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַֽעֲוָה֙ <S%H2113><s%> be removed ק) לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> to astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <S%H8322><s%> and to hissing כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you רֹאִ֖ים <S%H7200><s%> as ye see בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> with your eyes

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> have fallen אֲבוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> For lo our fathers בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword וּבָנֵ֨ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> and our sons וּבְנוֹתֵ֧ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> and our daughters וְנָשֵׁ֛ינוּ <S%H802><s%> and our wives בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> [are] in captivity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> is in לְבָבִ֔י <S%H3824><s%> Now [it is] in mine heart לִכְר֣וֹת <S%H3772><s%> to make בְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> may turn away מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> that חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> that his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> wrath

בָּנַ֕י <S%H1121><s%> My sons עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> be not תִּשָּׁל֑וּ <S%H7952><s%> be not now negligent כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָכֶ֞ם בָּחַ֣ר <S%H970><s%> young יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God לַעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> you to stand לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <S%H8334><s%> him to serve וְלִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ מְשָׁרְתִ֥ים <S%H8334><s%> him and that ye should minister וּמַקְטִרִֽים׃ <S%H6999><s%> unto him and burn incense ס

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose הַ֠לְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> Then the Levites מַ֣חַת <S%H4287><s%> Mahath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲמָשַׂ֞י <S%H6022><s%> of Amasai וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> and Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַרְיָהוּ֮ <S%H5838><s%> of Azariah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הַקְּהָתִי֒ <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the sons מְרָרִ֔י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari קִ֚ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5660><s%> of Abdi וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <S%H3094><s%> of Jehalelel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from הַגֵּ֣רְשֻׁנִּ֔י <S%H1649><s%> and of the Gershonites יוֹאָח֙ <S%H3098><s%> Joah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִמָּ֔ה <S%H2155><s%> of Zimmah וְעֵ֖דֶן <S%H5731><s%> and Eden בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָֽח׃ <S%H3098><s%> of Joah

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons אֱלִ֣יצָפָ֔ן <S%H469><s%> of Elizaphan שִׁמְרִ֖י <S%H8113><s%> Shimri [וִיעוּאֵל כ] (וִיעִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel ק) וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the sons אָסָ֔ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah וּמַתַּנְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H4983><s%> and Mattaniah ס

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons הֵימָ֖ן <S%H1968><s%> of Heman [יְחוּאֵל כ] (יְחִיאֵ֣ל <S%H3171><s%> Jehiel ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֑י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei ס וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the sons יְדוּת֔וּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun שְׁמַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel

וַיַּֽאַסְפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> And they gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> their brethren וַיִּֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> themselves and came כְמִצְוַת־ <S%H4687><s%> according to the commandment הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בְּדִבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> by the words יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְטַהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> to cleanse בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> went הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests לִפְנִ֣ימָה <S%H6441><s%> into the inner part בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְטַהֵר֒ <S%H2891><s%> to cleanse וַיּוֹצִ֗יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> [it] and brought out אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַטֻּמְאָה֙ <S%H2932><s%> all the uncleanness אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which מָֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> that they found בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַחֲצַ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> into the court בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיְקַבְּלוּ֙ <S%H6901><s%> took הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> [it] to carry [it] out לְנַֽחַל־ <S%H5158><s%> into the brook קִדְר֖וֹן <S%H6939><s%> Kidron חֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> abroad

וַ֠יָּחֵלּוּ <S%H2490><s%> Now they began בְּאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁוֹן֮ <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first לְקַדֵּשׁ֒ <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify וּבְי֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day שְׁמוֹנָ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> and on the eighth לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> came לְאוּלָ֣ם <S%H197><s%> they to the porch יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיְקַדְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H6942><s%> so they sanctified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְיָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> in eight וּבְי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> six עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> day of the first כִּלּֽוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> they made an end ס

וַיָּב֤וֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Then they went פְנִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H6441><s%> in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said טִהַ֖רְנוּ <S%H2891><s%> We have cleansed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> all the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> and the altar הָעוֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> with all the vessels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> table הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֖כֶת <S%H4635><s%> thereof and the shewbread וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָֽיו׃ <S%H3627><s%> with all the vessels
